Test Name: B-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia/Lymphoma (ALL) Specified FISH
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate, peripheral blood, or fresh/frozen tissue biopsy
Purpose: To detect specific genetic abnormalities in B-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia/Lymphoma using Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization.
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, FISH probes, humidified hybridization chamber
